title: diagnostics two unused_import warnings instead of one

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: D-verbose
labels.description: Too much output caused by a single piece of incorrect code

body:
I tried this code: you need `iced = "0.1.1"` as dep for this to build ```rust use iced::{ button, executor, scrollable, slider, text_input, Align, Application, Button, Checkbox, Column, Command, Container, Element, Length, ProgressBar, Radio, Row, Sandbox, Scrollable, Settings, Slider, Space, Text, TextInput, }; fn main() { println!("Hello, world!"); Rustasks::run(Settings::default()) } #[derive(Default)] struct Rustasks { // text: text_input::State, text: String, } impl Application for Rustasks { type Executor = executor::Null; type Message = (); type Flags = (); fn new(_flags: ()) -> (Rustasks, Command) { let text = String::from("ohai! :3"); let app = Rustasks { text }; (app, Command::none()) } fn title(&self) -> String { "Task app in rust".into() } fn update(&mut self, _message: Self::Message) -> Command { Command::none() } fn view(&mut self) -> Element { Text::new("Hello, world!").into() } } ``` For some reason, there were 2 unused import warnings while one would have been sufficient. I wonder why rustc does not condense the two into one. ```` warning: unused imports: `Align`, `Button`, `Checkbox`, `Column`, `Container`, `Length`, `ProgressBar`, `Radio`, `Row`, `Scrollable`, `Slider`, `Space`, `TextInput`, `button`, `scrollable`, `slider`, `text_input` --> src/main.rs:2:5 | 2 | button, executor, scrollable, slider, text_input, Align, Application, Button, Checkbox, Column, | ^^^^^^ ^^^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^^ ^^^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^ ^^^^^^ ^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^^ 3 | Command, Container, Element, Length, ProgressBar, Radio, Row, Sandbox, Scrollable, Settings, | ^^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^^ ^^^^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^ ^^^ ^^^^^^^^^^ 4 | Slider, Space, Text, TextInput, | ^^^^^^ ^^^^^ ^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(unused_imports)]` on by default warning: unused import: `Sandbox` --> src/main.rs:3:67 | 3 | Command, Container, Element, Length, ProgressBar, Radio, Row, Sandbox, Scrollable, Settings, | ^^^^^^^ ```` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.47.0-nightly (8e21bd063 2020-08-14) binary: rustc commit-hash: 8e21bd0633b8d970646ee6eb706c9e8acfad19af commit-date: 2020-08-14 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.47.0-nightly LLVM version: 10.0 ```
Backtrace

``` ```
